heading: Information We Collect
paragraph: We collect personal information that you provide to us directly when you register for an account, purchase courses, subscribe to our newsletters, or otherwise interact with the Site. The types of personal information we may collect include:

list.subParagraph: Name, email address, phone number, and mailing address.
Username, password, and other account details.
Credit card numbers, billing address, and other payment details necessary to process transactions.
Information about your interactions with our Site, including IP address, browser type, access times, and referring website addresses.
Information related to your preferences and interests, such as course selections and subscription preferences.

heading: How We Use Your Information
paragraph: We use the personal information we collect for various purposes, including:

list.subParagraph: To create and manage your account, process your transactions, and provide you with access to purchased courses and services.

To send you important updates about your account, course information, and promotional offers. You can opt-out of marketing communications at any time by following the unsubscribe instructions in the emails we send.
To respond to your inquiries, provide customer service, and address any issues or concerns you may have.
To analyze usage data and feedback to improve our Site and the quality of our courses and services.
To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and legal requests, and to protect our rights, privacy, safety, and property, as well as those of our users.

heading: How We Share Your Information
paragraph: We may share your personal information in the following circumstances:

list.subParagraph: We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processors, email service providers, and customer support vendors. These service providers are required to protect your information and use it only for the purposes for which it was disclosed.

In the event of a merger, acquisition, or other business reorganization, we may transfer your information to the acquiring entity. We will notify you of any such change in ownership or control of your personal information.
: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to a valid legal request, such as a subpoena, court order, or government investigation.
We may disclose your information to protect our rights, privacy, safety, and property, as well as those of our users, or to enforce our Terms and Conditions.

heading: Data Security
paragraph: We implement reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. While we strive to protect your information, no data transmission over the internet or electronic storage system can be guaranteed to be completely secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.

heading: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
paragraph: We use cookies and other tracking technologies to enhance your experience on the Site, analyze usage patterns, and deliver personalized content. Cookies are small data files stored on your device that help us remember your preferences and improve the functionality of the Site. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of the Site. For more information about the cookies we use and how to manage them, please refer to our Cookie Policy.

heading: Third-Party Links
paragraph: Our Site may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

heading: Childrenâ€™s Privacy
paragraph: The Site is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete such information promptly.

heading: Your Choices and Rights
paragraph: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. If you wish to update your account information or request the deletion of your data, please contact us using the information provided below. You also have the right to object to or restrict certain processing of your information, and to withdraw your consent where applicable. Please note that withdrawing consent does not affect the legality of any processing carried out before the withdrawal.

heading: Changes to This Privacy Policy
paragraph: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will post the updated Privacy Policy on the Site with a revised 'Last Updated' date. Your continued use of the Site after any changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.
